title: Ticket #7616: condor_q -submitters should honor accounting groups
description:
The -submitters argument to condor_q queries the collector for all of the submitter records matching a given a name. When there are multiple schedds, there can be multiple submitter records.

it then queries each schedd with a constraint 

Owner=="name"
, this works fine when the submitter is an actually an owner, but for jobs that have an AccountingGroup attribute, the submitter name is actually the value of the AccountingGroup attribute.

So it would be more correct for condor_q to use this constraint 

(AccountingGroup?:Owner)=="name"
. (For older schedds this will have to be written 
(AccountingGroup is undefined ? Owner : AccountingGroup)=="name"
check_ins: 2020-Apr-24 16:59   Check-in [59482]: for #7616 condor_q -submitters now correctly queries for jobs that match the submitter name (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
